import { useState } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { increasePages, decreasePages } from '../components/actions/pagesActions' import Proptypes from 'prop-types' const Pagination = (props) => { const pages = props.pages return (
  • props.increasePages(pages)}>-
  • props.clickHandler(pages[0])}>{pages[0]}
  • props.clickHandler(pages[1])}>{pages[1]}
  • props.clickHandler(pages[2])}>{pages[2]}
  • props.clickHandler(pages[3])}>{pages[3]}
  • props.clickHandler(pages[4])}>{pages[4]}
  • props.increasePages(pages)}>+
) } Pagination.propTypes = { increasePages: Proptypes.func.isRequired, decreasePages: Proptypes.func.isRequired, pages: Proptypes.array.isRequired } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ pages: state.pages.pages }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, { decreasePages,increasePages})(Pagination)
